total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 7 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the transformation rule from the examples given.
Q3: Apply the transformation rule to the pattern of the number 7 in the input grid.
Q4: Generate the output grid based on the transformation applied.
Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 7 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the transformation rule from the examples. In this case, the transformation rule seems to be that the number 7 rotates 90 degrees counterclockwise.
Q3: Apply the transformation rule to the pattern of the number 7 in the input grid of the quiz.
Q4: Replace the original pattern of the number 7 in the input grid with the transformed pattern to generate the output grid.
